name: Tower of Bricks
description:
Build the tallest tower of bricks in the world to reach the sky or even outer space with the power of one-tap gameplay!

Sounds easy, right?

-------------------------------

Tower of Bricks features:

Easy and fun to play
Addictive and impossible
Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!

-------------------------------

Already a fan of Tower of Bricks? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Tower of Bricks!
